name: Spaghetti
steps: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
In a separate pan, heat the tomato sauce and season with salt and pepper.
Drain the cooked spaghetti and add it to the sauce.
Serve the spaghetti with grated Parmesan cheese on top.

reviews.name: John Doe
reviews.comment: This recipe is amazing! I tried it and it was delicious!

reviews.name: Jane Smith
reviews.comment: I love this recipe! It's simple and delicious.

reviews.name: Bob Johnson
reviews.comment: The instructions were clear and easy to follow.

author: Bobby Lee
